snakeai.agent.agent_interface module¶

AbstractAgent¶

class snakeai.agents.agent_interface.AbstractAgent(dim, initial_epsilon=1)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract interface for all agents

Parameters

  • dim (int) – the side of the board

  • initial_epsilon (float [0,1]) – The initial probability of choosing an action at random

Variables

  • dim (int) – The side of the board

  • epsilon (float [0,1]) – The probability of choosing an action at random

MIN_EPSILON = 0.0001¶
abstract execute(state)¶

Get the next action to do, given the state

Parameters

state (FrozenState) – The current state of the game

Returns

the direction in which to move

Return type

Actions

abstract fit(old_state, action, rew, state, done)¶

Train the agent with data for a single step

Parameters

  • old_state (FrozenState) – The state before taking the action

  • action (Actions) – The action taken

  • rew (int) – The reward obtained

  • state (FrozenState) – The state after taking the action

  • done (bool) – Whether the new state is terminal

abstract classmethod load(dim, model_path)¶

Load the model from a specified path.

Parameters

  • dim (int) – The side of the board for the game

  • model_path (str) – the path to the model that must be loaded

reset()¶

Prepare the agent for starting a new game

abstract save(model_path=None)¶

Save the model. If no path is given, a default path will be used.

Parameters

model_path (str, optional) – the custom path where the model should be saved
